title: Publicize "story sketches"
body:
> “story sketches” - short stories (typically 2 to 12 pages) that depict the champion’s character in Runeterra. These aren’t canonical pieces, but instead conceptual reference stories meant to illustrate the personality of the champ and show thematics that we could express in their gameplay and art.

Can you release these to the public, it would be a nice change to get some in depth information for us lore-lovers.

replies.body:
That's very likely to happen. They would be the Narrative equivalent of concept art though so they wouldn't be canon or anything, and may be a little on the rough side here and there, but there are quite a few of us on Narrative and Champion who have liked the idea of showing some story sketches to you for a while.

TL;DR: Keep an eye out.
Yay! I feel like you'd need to have a specific title or disclaimer saying that it's "narrative concept art" so to speak, just so people have a clear understanding of what it even is.

WOW thank you for responding to me, it means a lot. :) Also I strongly agree with Azertazan, even if they are not canon it would be nice too see the thought processes behind the personalities/history of the champs.

I really like this idea. Even if it's not canon, it would still be really interesting to see what kind of thought went into creating a champion's personality. These pieces are just gathering dust, as I understand it, so why not release them to the community?
